name: Crimson Rose & White Lily
description:
After waking up from the weirdest dream, you find yourself in a strange place, among strange people. Realizing that you barely remember anything, you soon learn of your noble position in this world, and of your future engagement to ones of the princes of the region. Though, not everyone seem to be celebrating this news.

As you navigate in this new world, trying to find more information about yourself and your past, you will uncover court intrigues and dangerous plots. Your action may influence the world and people around you.

Crimson Rose & White Lily is a intrigue story set fantasy world inspired by the Victorian era and French 18th century court.

Content Warning: depiction of violence, death and sexually suggestive content.

  • Currently Available : Prologue + Chapter 1
  • Full character customization: appearance, gender, sexuality.
  • Puzzles and investigation.
  • Court intrigues and plots to uncover.
  • Build relationships with other characters and romance options (currently 2).

This project is a Work in Progress. The story and gameplay will develop with each chapter.
